```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r import_data4}
NSW <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 2, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
NSW <- NSW[c(16,32,48),2:12]
NSW <-t(NSW) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(NSW) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total")
NSW$States <- "NSW"

VIC <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 3, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
VIC <- VIC[c(16,32,48),2:12]
VIC <- t(VIC) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(VIC) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total")
VIC$States <- "VIC"

QLD <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 4, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
QLD <- QLD[c(16,32,48),2:12]
QLD <- t(QLD) %>% as_data_frame()
colnames(QLD) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total")
QLD$States <- "QLD"
rownames(QLD) <- rownames(VIC)

SA <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 5, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
SA <- SA[c(16,32,48),2:12]
SA <- t(SA) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(SA) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total")
SA$States <- "SA"

TAS <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 6, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
TAS <- TAS[c(16,32,48),2:12]
TAS <- t(TAS) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(TAS) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total") 
TAS$States <- "TAS"

NT <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 7, range = "A6:L22") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
NT <- NT[c(16),2:12] 
NT <- t(NT) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(NT) <- c("Total")
NT$Court <- as.factor (NA)
NT$Non_Court <-as.factor(NA)
NT$States <- "NT"
NT$Total <-as.factor(NT$Total)
NT <- NT %>% select(Court, Non_Court, Total, States)

ACT <- read_excel(here::here("data/5. police proceedings, selected states and territories.xls"), 
                      sheet = 8, range = "A6:L57") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(`Principal offence`))
ACT <- ACT[c(16,32,48),2:12]
ACT <- t(ACT) %>% as.data.frame()
colnames(ACT) <- c("Court", "Non_Court", "Total")
ACT$States <- "ACT"

data <- bind_rows(NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, TAS, ACT, NT)
```
